description.full: Take Mafia II out for a spin in the new playable demo. Step back into the 1950s as Vito and Joe take on high stakes jobs to work their way up through the Mafia. The demo offers all of the high speed chases, adrenalin filled gunplay and intense hand-to-hand fighting of the full game in a specially designed level.
description.short: Take Mafia II out for a spin in the new playable demo. Step back into the 1950s as Vito and Joe take on high stakes jobs to work their way up through the Mafia. The demo offers all of the high speed chases, adrenalin filled gunplay and intense hand-to-hand fighting of the full game in a specially designed level.
